text: Mirror () is a 1975 Soviet drama movie directed by Andrei TarkovskyКлассика попала в фокусЗеркало and stars Filipp Yankovsky, Ignat Daniltsev, and Innokenty Smoktunovsky. ==Actors== * Filipp Yankovsky as the child Aleksei * Ignat Daniltsev as the adolescent Aleksei and Ignat, Aleksei's son * Innokenty Smoktunovsky as the adult Aleksei (voice only) * Margarita Terekhova as the young Maria/Masha/Marusya (Aleksei's mother) and Natalia (Aleksei's wife) * Maria Vishnyakova (Tarkovsky's real-life mother) as the elderly Maria * Oleg Yankovsky as Aleksei's father * Alla Demidova as Liza, Maria's friend at printing house * Anatoly Solonitsyn as forensic doctor, the passerby == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1975 drama movies Category:1970s biographical movies Category:Movies set in Russia Category:Movies set in the 1930s Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:Movies directed by Andrei Tarkovsky Category:Soviet drama movies
